yo insert the hook from front to back and to front again under the front and back vertical bar of the next stitch 2 row down - yo and pull up a loop - yo and pull through 1 loop on hook - yo and pull through 2 loops on hook - keep the loop on the hook colour change for this pattern you need to change the colour after each row it is changed at the end of the return pass when there are only two loops left on the hook simply pick up the new colour and pull it through the last two stitches at once the last stitch on the crochet hook now has the new colour the unused yarn is not cut but carried along the side 2024 -
